Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2012 11:19AM sidekick wrote: I had a lumpectormy on underside of my left breast and snb on August 2, 2011.  all went very well except Onco score is 34.  so I have just finished chemo and will begin rads on mid-late March.  All of you ladies are incredible.  I have done so much better mentally and physically than I thought i would have.  this is due to My Lord, loving husband,wonderful family and friends.  Good luck to all of you!!!! Carlynn
